named-query.name: BC_FIND_NEXT_ID
named-query.query: SELECT idGeneration FROM org.broadleafcommerce.profile.domain.IdGeneration idGeneration WHERE idGeneration.type = :idType

named-query.name: BC_UPDATE_NEXT_ID
named-query.query: UPDATE org.broadleafcommerce.profile.domain.IdGeneration idGeneration SET idGeneration.batchStart = :batchStart WHERE idGeneration.type = :idType
